title: About
text:
01. Caminhos com here()

#install.packages("here)
here::here()

[1] "C:/Users/Windows/OneDrive/Documentos/meu-blog/quarto-site-alex"

here::here("styles.css")

[1] "C:/Users/Windows/OneDrive/Documentos/meu-blog/quarto-site-alex/styles.css"


This is a Quarto website.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

1 + 1

[1] 2




02. Bônus! Trocar idioma
No _quarto.yml
lang:pt


03. Chunks #|

#fs::file_move("~/Downloads/gato.webp", "images")
knitr::include_graphics(here::here("images/clipboard-1069107497
Podemos usar knitr::convert_chunk_header()
knitr::convert_chunk_header=("index.qmd", "index2.qmd")
cria um arquivo que arruma os cabecalhos antigos e mexe.


04. Citações no Visual editor
Segundo Wickham (2016); Wickham, Vaughan, e Girlich (2023), computadores são. Wickham (2016) isso é bom.
knitr::write_bib("here","packages.bib")
knitr::write_bib(c("here", "tidyverse", "packages.bib"))
Tidyverse: Wickham, Vaughan, e Girlich (2023). Here: Müller (2020)


05. Include ou child
Um chunk externo

1 + 1

[1] 2




06. Usando parâmetros

params$data

[1] "2024-06-12"




07. Inline + formatacao
3.1415927
344 linhas.


10. Font Awesome
quarto install extension quarto-ext/fontawesome





Referências

Müller, Kirill. 2020. here: A Simpler Way to Find Your Files. https://here.r-lib.org/.


Wickham, Hadley. 2016. «ggplot2: Elegant Graphics for Data Analysis». https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org.


Wickham, Hadley, Davis Vaughan, e Maximilian Girlich. 2023. «tidyr: Tidy Messy Data». https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=tidyr.
